features: Made of 86% recycled polyester/14% spandex dobby with four-way stretch and a PFC-free DWR finish (durable water repellent coating that does not contain perfluorinated chemicals)
Partially elasticized waistband for secure fit and comfort
Two zippered front pockets; two zippered back pockets; one zippered thigh pocket
Straight-panel gusset through inseam for mobility
Fair Trade Certified™ sewn, which means the people who made it earned a premium for their labor

4.7-oz 86% recycled polyester/14% spandex dobby with four-way stretch and a PFC-free DWR finish (durable water repellent coating that does not contain perfluorinated chemicals). Fair Trade Certified™ sewn
